name: 圖形識別
goals: Build theoretical concepts of Pattern Recognition.
Understand current situation in the market of Pattern Recognition.
Build ability to implement application of Pattern Recognition.
syllabus: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques used in the field of pattern recognition and their applications.

methodologies.note: 講解圖形識別之技術與未來發展及相關應用。
以專題報告方式進行專業知識討論與交流。
以程式實作方式了解圖形識別之原理及應用。

grading.note: 課程專業知識之期中測驗
課程專業知識之期末測驗

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
